name: Feedback Sports Ultralight Work Stand
description: This bike stand folds down small. Great for condo living or when your race support crew consists of your spouse in a Smart car. The clamp adjusts precisely to protect your frame and rotates 360-degrees for easy access.Slide-lock clamp with torque-amplifying clutch.Adjustable height and a stable tripod designClamp height adjusts from 91 to 147cm.Jaw width is 82.5mm.Wide tripod with 137cm base for stability.Folded size is 12.7 x 16.8 x 93.7cm.
